actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to disapprove the final recommendations for the basic route system of Amtrak submitted by the Secretary of Transportation.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives with respect to the Secretary of Transportation's recommendations designating the basic route system for the National Railroad Passenger Corporation as submitted to the Congress on January 31, 1979.

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove the final recommendations for the basic route system of Amtrak submitted by the Secretary of Transportation.
